original_title: RÜFÜS DU SOL: Live from Joshua Tree
overview: Enter into the vast world of Rüfüs Du Sol in this immersive film experience capturing the band's powerful live energy set against a backdrop of desert terrain. Performing their hits Solace, Underwater, and Innerbloom, the live project also features the new track Valley of the Yuccas. Live from Joshua Tree unearths a meaningful & personal body of work created for their dedicated fans around the globe.
title: RÜFÜS DU SOL: Live from Joshua Tree
